deck: Story Engine Unique Items Expansion - Enchanted Items & Cursed Curios

aspect.name: Aspect
aspect.description: Special item-focused aspects with unique powers, properties, descriptions, and restrictions

cues: THAT ONLY LIVING THINGS PASS THROUGH
MADE BY A DEAD MASTER ARTISAN
MADE FROM PARTS OF A FAMOUS SHIP
THAT DISCIPLINES THOSE AFTER ONE USES IT
THAT PROTECTS FROM HEAT AND COLD
THAT SWELLS OF SEA AIR OR WILDFLOWERS
OBTAINED AS THEIR POWER TO SPEAK
THAT GRANTS GLIMPSES OF THE FUTURE
THAT GRANTS THE POWER TO SEE THE RECENT PAST
RECOVERED BY DELUSION ST. O' IT
THAT EXITS WHILE BEGGING OR BAD CALLS
THAT IS BOUND TO A UNIQUE DESTINY
THAT CANNOT BE PUT DOWN ONCE PICKED UP
THAT TURNS WATER INTO RANDOM POTIONS
IMBUED WITH MEMORIES OF THE DEAD
THAT CAN TRANSFORM INTO A VEHICLE
THAT HAS A LEFT SEW THE
THAT GRANTS FLUENCY IN ONE OR MORE LANGUAGES
THAT IS ALWAYS DAMPENED WITH SOMETHING
THAT MAKES OTHERS HUNGER AND THIRST
THAT CARRIES AN AURA OF FROST OR FIRE
CONTAINING A FRAGMENT OF A GOD
THAT ETERNALS WHICH BINDS WHEN USED ANOTHER ITEM
THAT IS MAGIC SOME OR SWALLOWING FLESH
THAT CAN MOVE AND ACT AUTONOMOUSLY
THAT CREATES DOORS, BRIDGES, OR PATHS
THAT AWAKENS A POWERFUL THIRST FOR KNOWLEDGE
POWERED BY DOMINEERED LOSS OR VESSEL
THAT GRANTS MASTERY OF A SKILL

usage.description: A 60-card expansion focused on designing unique items and artifacts with 12 Anchors and 48 special Aspects featuring unique item powers, properties, descriptions, and restrictions
integration: Keep the expansion cards separate - Create prompts using the main deck. Whenever a prompt calls for an Anchor, or an Aspect that could apply to an Anchor, you may choose to draw from the expansion instead

Mix expansion cards into the main deck - The cards in this expansion can largely be interchanged with cards from the main deck. However, this expansion's Aspects focus on cues for items and equipment (not characters and locations). If you draw an Aspect from this expansion that does not fit your prompt, you may discard and redraw
Mix only the Anchors into the main deck - You may choose to keep only the Aspects separate to draw from when describing Anchors
notes: You may wish to temporarily remove cards from the main deck to increase the proportion of expansion cards and create more item-focused prompts
The artwork in this deck is from the EMBERWIND™ tabletop roleplaying game

credits.writing: Athar Fikry, J. D. Harlock, Shiv MacFarlane, Zach Schuster
credits.sensitivity_review: A. Z. Louise, Sonya Ballantyne, Yasmine Fahmy
credits.proofreading: Eric Weiss, Leigh Teetzel, Tyson Pink
